Method.desc: Creates a new task named `taskName` in the workspace `workspaceName`.
Method.doc:
Creates a new task named `taskName` in the workspace `workspaceName`.

Parameters:
 * taskName (String)      - The title of the Asana task.
 * WorkspaceName (String) - The name of the workspace in which to create the task.

Returns:
 * Self

Examples:
 ```
 spoon.Asana.createTask("Do that thing I forgot about", "My Company Workspace")
 ```
Method.name: createTask
parameters: * taskName (String)      - The title of the Asana task.
* WorkspaceName (String) - The name of the workspace in which to create the task.
Method.stripped_doc:

Variable.desc: A "personal access token" for Asana. You can create one here: https://app.asana.com/0/developer-console
Variable.doc: A "personal access token" for Asana. You can create one here: https://app.asana.com/0/developer-console
Variable.name: apiKey

desc: Simple spoon that creates a new task in Asana with a given name in a given workspace.
